name: Helly The Hero
description:
Somewhere, in a faraway fantasy land, there lies a humble kingdom. Lush grasslands as far as the eye can see. Clear, blue skies set a peaceful mood. Trees that bear juicy fruits for all to enjoy. Pristine, medieval castles with some of the finest protectors of the people. Fresh air, good food, and so little conflict... There isn't a finer kingdom in all the land.

But now... this kingdom is in desperate need of a hero.

Magical, the great sage, stumbles upon a wanderer named Helly. This lone warrior, possessing nothing but his trusty axe, must be the Destined One! Helly will be chosen by Magical for a perilous quest that no other mortal soul is capable of surviving.

Helly has an array of skills; use some MP for powerful Flame magic, or store up your TP for even more devastating attacks! You must plan each move carefully, since these battles require a strategic mind of unparalleled caliber.

A short RPG Maker MV game developed for the Community Game Jam. (Theme: The Game is a Liar)
